mapper.select:
select o.oid, o.odid, o.o_uid, r.r_nickname, o.o_uaddress, o.createtime, o.regenerant, o.o_weight, o.receiving, o.o_clerkid, o.o_ucid, o.o_money, o.o_fintime, o.delflag, o.optid, o.optime, o.remark
from t_orderinfo o, t_resident r where o.delflag=0 and o.o_uid=r.r_id
and r.r_nickname like concat('%',#{searchByUserId},'%')
order by o.createtime desc limit #{pageBean.start},#{pageBean.rows}
select count(*) from t_orderinfo where delflag=0
select r_id from t_resident where r_nickname=#{r_nickname} and delflag=0
mapper.update: update t_orderinfo set o_uaddress=#{o_uaddress}, o_weight=#{o_weight}, remark=#{remark} where oid=#{oid}
update t_orderinfo set delflag=1 where oid=#{oid}
